content: **knitted neck-warmer and hat in drops lima and drops kid-silk the piece is worked bottom up ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the cardinal song neck-warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-159 yarn group b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **hat** **sizes** m/l - l/xl fits head-size approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 3609 red and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25 g colour 14 red **needles** drops circular needles size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/242-22-b-cardinal-song-neck-warmer
